<http://www.purestorage.com> <http://info.purestorage.com/2015.09.30-NAM-Webinar-VMTurbo_Register.html?utm_source=VMturbo> Webinar: All-Flash, All Control: Customer Showcase Webinar Is virtualization in your datacenter being restricted by traditional storage solutions? Disk-based storage and controllers create consuming bottlenecks that limit application performance, resulting in more time spent battling issues in the datacenter.
Pure Storage and VMTurbo partner to deliver better reliability that is time efficient and cost effective. By pairing Pure’s all-flash controllers and VMTrubo’s Demand-Driven Control, more than 2,000 customers have taken control of their datacenter back.
Join us <http://info.purestorage.com/2015.09.30-NAM-Webinar-VMTurbo_Register.html?utm_source=VMturbo> for this Customer Showcase webinar to hear directly from our customers as they share their success stories and how your organization can benefit too. Highlights include
• City of Garland, Texas frees-up more than $200K in server hardware and hypervisor licensing, repurposing that to build a new VDI environment based on Pure Storage • Presenter – Dammions Darden, Senior Systems Administrator • Sheppard Mullin uses VMTurbo to migrate from NetApp to Pure Storage simply and quickly, all while assuring performance with no downtime • Presenter – Richard Chun, Virtualization Network Engineer
Date: September 30, 2015
Time: 10am PT/ 1pm ET <http://info.purestorage.com/2015.09.30-NAM-Webinar-VMTurbo_Register.html?utm_source=VMturbo> © Pure Storage, Inc. 650 Castro Street, Suite #260 Mountain View, CA 94041 | Privacy Policy <http://www.purestorage.com/privacy/> | Terms of Use <http://www.purestorage.com/terms/>
